title: why do the city of wilmington landscape crews maintain medians along 17th st, but skip over the ones in front of the hospital and medical mall?
text:
In a word: Funding. The crew will eventually hit those areas, but the
city -- like others across the county -- have to allot certain
resources and can't get to everything they did before. Our city
reporter is looking about doing a story on this in a few weeks.
